meaning_str.bing:
n. （常指带檐的）帽子；（双重的）职位
v. 〈口〉给…戴上帽子
网络. 礼帽；有沿的帽子；戴帽子

（常指带檐的）帽子；（双重的）职位
礼帽；有沿的帽子；戴帽子

（常指带檐的）帽子；头饰；头盔；（双重的，尤指官职或职业角色）角色；职位；头衔；（尤指体育比赛中的）戴帽子的成就
给…戴帽子；制造帽子；为…提供帽子；为…供应帽子；覆盖；遮顶

1.en: And now, what say you to going to Edgar's Buildings with me, and looking at my new hat?
1.cn: 现在吗，就陪我到埃德加大楼，去看看我的新帽子，好吗？

2.en: She is wearing a brown jacket, blue jeans , a brown scarf , a pink hat on her head and a pink handbag in her hand.
2.cn: 她穿着一件棕色的夹克，蓝色的牛仔裤棕色的围巾，头上戴着粉色的帽子，手上拿着粉色的手提包。

3.en: Baldness is often blamed on poor circulation to the scalp, vitamin deficiencies, dandruff, and even excessive hat wearing.
3.cn: 秃发常常归咎于周转不畅的头皮，维生素不足，头皮屑、甚至过度帽子戴。

0.en: Hey. Hey. Hey, check out the hat.

1.en: That's rude. Now it has a hat on it.
1.cn: 太粗鲁了你。再加顶帽子。

2.en: Where are we gonna find a tiny little hat?

3.en: No! The wind has blown George's hat off.
3.cn: 噢，不！风把乔治的帽子吹掉了。

4.en: I like your hat. Thanks, my mom made it.
4.cn: 我很喜欢你的帽子。谢谢，是我妈做的。

5.en: Don't worry George! Daddy Pig will catch your hat!
5.cn: 别着急，乔治！猪爸爸会追上你的帽子的！

6.en: Or we could put a hat on his head. A hat. Yes. We need a hat. We need a hat.
6.cn: 或者我们也可以帮他戴帽子。帽子！没错，我们需要帽子。

7.en: Wow. You saw the hat in the kitchen and you knew that she'd have to go in there hat-less to get it.
7.cn: 你看到帽子在厨房，知道她会不戴帽子进去取。

8.en: Where's George's hat? It's on your head! Here's your hat George! Hold onto it this time!
8.cn: 乔治的帽子呢？在你头上呢！你的帽子在这儿，乔治！这次要抓紧哦！

9.en: Where's George's hat? It's on your head. Here's your hat George. Hold onto it this time. The wind is blowing all the leaves off the trees.
9.cn: 乔治的帽子在哪？在你的头上！你的帽子，乔治！这次要抓紧了。大风把树上所有的帽子都吹走了。

10.en: What a minute, I know that hat. I was taken aboard that hat. They did experiments on me. I can't have children.
10.cn: 慢着，我认得那顶帽子，我被戴上那顶帽子，它们对我做实验，我不能生育了。

11.en: I've got Kate a hat, red hat. Lovely, yeah. Which is good. A scarf. Lovely. Beautiful, look at that. Hold on, very nice, yes.
11.cn: 我给凯特买了顶帽子，红帽子。可爱，耶。很不错。围巾，真好。漂亮，看看吧。等等，真好，对。

12.en: What are you going to do? Well, I'm going to wear a hat.
12.cn: 你准备怎么办？我会戴帽子。

13.en: Daddy Pig looks quite cold. He isn't wearing his hat and scarf and gloves. Daddy, why aren't you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?
13.cn: 猪爸爸看上去很冷。他的帽子围巾和手套一样都没带。爸爸，你怎么不带上你的帽子，还有围巾和你的手套呢？

14.en: And where is your hat? It's in the kitchen, I'll go get it.
14.cn: 你的帽子呢？在厨房，我进去拿。

15.en: It's getting even windier. Hold onto your hats. Oh no. The wind has blown George's hat off.
15.cn: 现在风好像刮得更大了，大家把帽子带紧。不好，大风把乔治的帽子吹跑了。

16.en: And this time, they've ganged up to form one giant, super hat.
16.cn: 这一回它们聚集成一顶超级大帽子。

17.en: Max, do you want to try it on? Ahem, she doesn't need a hat. Romes said I could have the sweet hat!
17.cn: 麦克斯，你想戴戴看吗？她不需要帽子啦。罗米说我可以戴美帽！

18.en: Don't worry George. Daddy Pig will catch your hat. Quick, Daddy. Look. It's in that little tree.
18.cn: 别担心，乔治。爸爸会找回你的帽子的。快点，爸爸！瞧，帽子跑到树上去了。

19.en: Daddy Pig's hat and scarf and gloves are on the snowman! Oh!
19.cn: 猪爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套都在雪人身上！
